description: Dashboard for Quarkus applications instrumented with the Micrometer to OpenTelemetry bridge.

targets.expr: sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{ area = "heap", job = "$instance"}) * 100 / sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{ area = "heap", job = "$instance" })
sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{ area = "nonheap", job = "$instance" }) * 100 / sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{ area = "nonheap", job = "$instance" })

panels.title: Sum of the duration of every request
Sum of the duration of every GraphQL request

title: Quarkus Micrometer OpenTelemetry
